steps.title: We map your position in the latent space
steps.subtitle: step 01
body: The engagement begins with a comprehensive audit. We analyze how AI models currently perceive your brand—examining entity associations, selection rates, and semantic gaps.
You'll receive a detailed report showing exactly where you stand versus competitors, with quantified visibility scores and specific opportunities for improvement.

steps.title: We architect your machine-readable foundation
steps.subtitle: step 02
body: Based on audit findings, we design a technical architecture that addresses your specific gaps. Schema.org markup, entity optimization, content structure—everything AI needs to understand you correctly.
Every recommendation is tied to measurable outcomes. No vague 'best practices'—just engineered solutions for your identified problems.

steps.title: We build and deploy the infrastructure
steps.subtitle: step 03
body: Our team implements the technical changes—whether that's structured data, content optimization, or knowledge graph integration. We work alongside your development team or handle it entirely.
Everything is documented, validated, and tested against real AI model responses before going live.

steps.title: We track Selection Rate improvement
steps.subtitle: step 04
body: Post-implementation, we monitor how AI models respond to your optimized presence. Selection Rate, entity accuracy, recommendation frequency—all measured and reported.
This isn't a one-time project. As AI models evolve, we ensure your relevance engineering evolves with them.
